__e: A man trapped in the night he was killed, still out there, wandering the swamp each night trying to find his daddy.
Remember, Jane falls in that swamp, and then she comes out 20 years later.
The bog is yours, if my wife is willing.
Now I'm just an average schnook like everyone else, stuck in this backwater burg where all you can count on is your family, and the only one who ever shot anyone is the baby.
Well, well, well. So you're the swamp witch I've heard so much about.
Thank you, Goth, I am glad that someone finds it possible to see sense through this morass of ill-will...
